pages.text: Accessed with the $(l:geats/items/raise_buckles#jyamato_buckle)Jyamato Buckle$(/l) (use in your off-hand to switch sides)

pages.title: Jyamato Rider
pages.text: Appears in:$(li)Kamen Rider Geats (2022, TV show)$(br2)Transforms with the $(l:geats/devices/desire_driver#desire_driver_jyamato)Desire Driver$(/l)$(br2)Core ID Effects:$(li)Speed$(br2)Jyamato Buckle Effects:$(li)Resistance II$(li)Strength IV

pages.name: BoostJyamato Form
pages.text: Accessed with the $(l:geats/items/raise_buckles#fever_slot_raise_buckle)Feverslot Buckle$(/l) in your main hand and the $(l:geats/items/raise_buckles#jyamato_buckle)Jyamato Buckle$(/l) in your off-hand

pages.title: Jyamato Rider
pages.text: Appears in:$(li)Kamen Rider Geats (2022, TV show)$(br2)Transforms with the $(l:geats/devices/desire_driver#desire_driver_jyamato)Desire Driver$(/l)$(br2)Core ID Effects:$(li)Speed$(br2)Boost Buckle Effects:$(li)Boost$(br2)Jyamato Buckle Effects:$(li)Resistance II$(li)Strength IV

pages.name: MonsterJyamato Form
pages.text: Accessed with the $(l:geats/items/raise_buckles#fever_slot_raise_buckle)Feverslot Buckle$(/l) in your main hand and the $(l:geats/items/raise_buckles#jyamato_buckle)Jyamato Buckle$(/l) in your off-hand

pages.title: Jyamato Rider
pages.text: Appears in:$(li)Kamen Rider Geats (2022, TV show)$(br2)Transforms with the $(l:geats/devices/desire_driver#desire_driver_jyamato)Desire Driver$(/l)$(br2)Core ID Effects:$(li)Speed$(br2)Monster Buckle Effects:$(li)Punch V$(li)Strength VIII (with empty hand)$(li)Resistance II$(br2)Jyamato Buckle Effects:$(li)Resistance II$(li)Strength IV
